text: Mathieu Hubertus Josephus Schoenmaekers (13 December 1875, Maastricht - 18 December 1944, Laren) was a mathematician and theosophist who formulated the plastic and philosophical principles of the De Stijl movement. ==Sources== Biography at the Institute for Dutch History (in Dutch) Category:1875 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Dutch Theosophists Category:De Stijl Category:People from Maastricht
title: M. H. J. Schoenmaekers
